## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AIK1, MAPKKK20, MKKK20</u>
- **Gene Name:** ABA-INSENSITIVE PROTEIN KINASE 1, mitogen-activated protein kinase kinase kinase 20, MAPKK kinase 20

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_021755C]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Increased sensitivity to oryzalin, roots significantly shortened.
   - [SALK_049616C]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Decreased sensitivity to ABA during root growth, with longer and more pronounced root elongation zones (increased cell length and increased number of cells) compared to wild type. Stomatal closing less sensitive to ABA than wild type.  Slightly greater stomatal density and reduced pavement cell density.
